title: Mrs.Brown
description: A comprehensive medical interview focusing on systemic examination including digestive, cardiovascular, respiratory, neurological and psychological symptoms

conversation.teacherApp: Say "Ready to practice" to begin your medical English session!
conversation.expectedResponse: Ready to practice

conversation.teacherApp: You address the patient: Тепер, місіс Браун, чи можете ви мені сказати
conversation.expectedResponse: Now, Mrs Brown, can you tell me

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about digestion: чи є у вас проблеми зі шлунком?
conversation.expectedResponse: Do you have stomach problems?

conversation.teacherApp: You continue: або кишечником?
conversation.expectedResponse: or bowels?

conversation.teacherApp: Patient admits issue: Ну, у мене іноді буває невеликий розлад шлунку
conversation.expectedResponse: Well, I sometimes get a bit of indigestion

conversation.teacherApp: You show interest: Зрозуміло. І чи можете розповісти більше?
conversation.expectedResponse: I see. And could you tell me more about that?

conversation.teacherApp: Patient explains: Ну, він виникає лише тоді, коли я їм щось гостре.
conversation.expectedResponse: Well, it only comes on if I have something spicy
conversation.grammarNote: First Conditional - if clause with Present Simple

conversation.teacherApp: Patient gives example: знаєте, як каррі
conversation.expectedResponse: you know, like a curry

conversation.teacherApp: You reassure patient: Зрозуміло. Це цілком нормально.
conversation.expectedResponse: I see. Well, that is quite normal.

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about appetite: А який у вас апетит?
conversation.expectedResponse: And what is your appetite like?

conversation.teacherApp: Patient responds: Непоганий
conversation.expectedResponse: Not bad.

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about urination: Чи є проблеми з сечовиділенням?
conversation.expectedResponse: Do you have problems with your waterworks?
conversation.grammarNote: Present Simple question - informal medical term

conversation.teacherApp: Patient denies problems: Ні, все гаразд
conversation.expectedResponse: No, they are all right.
conversation.grammarNote: Simple negative response with pronoun reference

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about menstruation: Чи є у вас ще регулярні місячні?
conversation.expectedResponse: And are you still having your periods regularly?
conversation.grammarNote: Present Continuous for ongoing state with 'still'

conversation.teacherApp: Patient explains menopause: Ні, вони припинилися. Мабуть, років п'ять тому.
conversation.expectedResponse: No, they stopped. Must have been five years ago.
conversation.grammarNote: Past Simple with modal 'must have been' for past speculation

conversation.teacherApp: You note information: Хм. Чи є біль у грудях?
conversation.expectedResponse: Hmm. Any pain in the chest?

conversation.teacherApp: You check cardiovascular symptoms: Прискорене серцебиття? Набряки на щиколотках?
conversation.expectedResponse: Any palpitation? Swelling of the ankles?

conversation.teacherApp: Patient denies symptoms: Не дуже, лікарю
conversation.expectedResponse: Not really, Doctor.

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about respiratory: А як щодо кашлю чи хрипів?
conversation.expectedResponse: And what about coughs or wheezing

conversation.teacherApp: You complete question: або задишки?
conversation.expectedResponse: or shortness of breath?

conversation.teacherApp: Patient clarifies condition: Тільки коли у мене застуда
conversation.expectedResponse: Only when I have got a cold.
conversation.grammarNote: Time clause with Present Perfect 'have got'

conversation.teacherApp: You check neurological symptoms: Чи відчуваєте ви слабкість або поколювання в кінцівках?
conversation.expectedResponse: Have you noticed any weakness or tingling in your limbs?
conversation.grammarNote: Present Perfect for experience - 'have you noticed'

conversation.teacherApp: Patient denies symptoms: Ні, не можу сказати, що помічала
conversation.expectedResponse: No, I can not say that I have noticed
conversation.grammarNote: Modal 'can' with Present Perfect in reported speech

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about mood: Який у вас настрій останнім часом?
conversation.expectedResponse: What sort of mood have you been in recently?
conversation.grammarNote: Present Perfect Continuous with time expression 'recently'

conversation.teacherApp: Patient admits depression: Я почуваюся трохи пригнічено
conversation.expectedResponse: I have been feeling a bit down.
conversation.grammarNote: Present Perfect Continuous for recent ongoing state

conversation.teacherApp: Patient explains sleep issue: Знаєте, я погано сплю
conversation.expectedResponse: You know, I am not sleeping well.
conversation.grammarNote: Present Continuous for current ongoing problem

conversation.teacherApp: Well done, that's all for today's lesson, say "finish" to end the lesson.
conversation.expectedResponse: finish.
